channel.title: Combat bugged?
channel.description:
Hey guys, i'm currently using the source exitium (great source btw), however, when i try to do combat, when i click attack on a player to try and fight, it just dces the whole server and i have to re-run it, and it happens for every weapon, spec or no spec. Any idea why? any advice would be nice.
If needed, will be giving a little reward to making it work.
